label: Serra from the 'Queen Mary Psalter' (British Library Royal 2 B VII, fol. 88v)
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of a serra, a sea monster with fins so enormous that they appear as wings.

label: Serra from the 'Queen Mary Psalter' (British Library Royal 2 B VII, fol. 89)
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of a serra, a sea monster with enormous fins, attacking four men and a woman in a boat.

label: Dragon from a Mahzor (British Library Add. 9405, fol. 3v)
marginalia_description: A detail of a fire-breathing dragon drawn next to the opening words of the Book of Ruth.

label: Dragon from a Mahzor (British Library Add. 9405, fol. 6)
marginalia_description: A detail of a dragon biting its arm next to the opening words of Ecclesiastes.

label: Dragon from a Festival Prayer Book (British Library Add. 16577, fol. 44v)
marginalia_description: A detail of a dragon whose tail encircles a caption.

label: Dragon from a Pentateuch (British Library Add. 26878, fol. 43v)
marginalia_description: A dragon among text.

label: Dragon from a Pentateuch (British Library Add. 26878, fol. 133v)
marginalia_description: A carmina figurata of a dragon.

label: Hybrids from the 'Luttrell Psalter' (British Library Add. 42130, fol. 62v)
marginalia_description: Folio with text from Psalm 32, with a multitude of hybrids in the margins. In addition to the hybrids, there is a man with blue skin at the bottom of the page.

label: Hybrid from the 'Luttrell Psalter' (British Library Add. 42130, fol. 81v)
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of a large grotesque hybrid next to a seated woman.

label: Hybrid from Scholastic Miscellany (British Library Burney 275, fol. 143)
marginalia_description: A detail of a winged half-man, half-beast hybrid wearing a bishop's mitre.

label: Hybrids from Scholastic Miscellany (British Library Burney 275, fol. 166)
marginalia_description: A detail of two hybrid creatures fighting with swords and shields.

label: Hybrid from the 'Harley Hours' (British Library Harley 928, fol. 010)
marginalia_description: A detail of a grotesque hybrid.

label: Serra from a Bestiary (British Library Sloane 3544, fol. 42v)
marginalia_description: A detail of a serra chasing a boat, while the two men in the boat raise their hands in prayer.

label: Hybrids from a copy of 'De Amicitia' (Bodleian Library MS. Canon. Class. Lat. 221, fol. 001r)
marginalia_description: At the top of the page sits a blue hybrid, with a human head and an animal-like body. At the bottom of the page, there is another hybrid, with a human body and animal-like legs.

label: Hybrid from a copy of the 'Lancelot Cycle, Branch 1' (Bodleian Library MS. Douce 303, fol. 001r)
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of a man chasing a stag, which appears to be running towards a grotesque hybrid.

label: Hybrids in a Benedictian Breviary (Bodleian Library MS. Canon. Liturg. 192, fol. 199r)
marginalia_description: At the bottom of the page are two hybrids. The hybrid on the left holds a disc that contains text from the Magnificat and Ave Maria. The hybrid on the right appears to be holding a serpent, which bears a striking resemblance to its own tails.

label: Hybrids from a Psalter (Bodleian Library MS. Douce 5, fol. 019r)
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of two grotesque hybrids playing musical instruments. The hybrid on the left, whose body is entirely animalistic, appears to be playing a triangle. The hybrid on the right, who has a human head and torso, but the bottom half of a bird, plays a fiddle.

label: Serra from a Bestiary (Bodleian Library MS. Laud Misc. 247, fol. 141v)
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of a serra, a fish-like monster with enormous wings, eating some fish.

label: Phoenix from a Bestiary (Bodleian Library MS. Laud Misc. 247, fol. 144r)
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of a phoenix preening its wings.

label: Dragon from a Bible (Bodleian Library MS. Canon. Bibl. Lat. 80, fol. 008v)
marginalia_description: A winged dragon sits at the bottom of the page, below the opening text to the Book of Genesis.

label: Hybrid from a Book of Hours (Bodleian Library MS. Douce 62, fol. 003r)
artist: Attributed to the Master of the Brussels Initials, though there is an extra hand working in the borders
marginalia_description: A grotesque hybrid with the head of a man and the body of a beast sits at the right margin of the page.

label: Hybrids from a Book of Hours (Bodleian Library MS. Douce 62, fol. 004v)
artist: Attributed to the Master of the Brussels Initials, though there is an extra hand working in the borders
marginalia_description: Two grotesque hybrids, both with the head of a man and the body of a beast, sit in the left margin of the left page.

label: Dragon from a Book of Hours (Bodleian Library MS. Douce 62, fol. 006v)
artist: Attributed to the Master of the Brussels Initials, though there is an extra hand working in the borders
marginalia_description: A dragon sits at the top margin of the left page.

label: Serra from a Bestiary (British Library Sloane 3544, fol. 43)
marginalia_description: A detail of a serra swimming alongside a boat, while the two men in the boat raise their hands in prayer.

label: Hybrids from a Book of Hours (Bodleian Library MS. Douce 62, fol. 006v)
artist: Attributed to the Master of the Brussels Initials, though there is an extra hand working in the borders
marginalia_description: Two hybrids, both with the head of a man and the body of a beast, appear in the left margin of the left page. One appears to be eating a flower and the other is playing an instrument.

label: Hybrid from a Book of Hours (Bodleian Library MS. Douce 62, fol. 009v)
artist: Attributed to the Master of the Brussels Initials, though there is an extra hand working in the borders
marginalia_description: A hybrid with the head of a man and the body of a beast sits in the left margin of the left page.

label: Hybrid from a Book of Hours (Bodleian Library MS. Douce 62, fol. 010v)
artist: Attributed to the Master of the Brussels Initials, though there is an extra hand working in the borders
marginalia_description: A hybrid with the head of a man, the body of a beast, and the wings of a bird sits in the left margin of the left page.

label: Hybrid from a Book of Hours (Bodleian Library MS. Douce 62, fol. 039v)
artist: Attributed to the Master of the Brussels Initials, though there is an extra hand working in the borders
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of a hybrid with a man's head and torso and a beast's legs. He holds some sort of implement in his hands.

label: A Mermaid or Siren from a Book of Hours (Bodleian Library MS. Douce 62, fol. 051r)
artist: Attributed to the Master of the Brussels Initials, though there is an extra hand working in the borders
marginalia_description: A close detail of either a mermaid or a siren holding a comb and mirror.

label: A Hybrid from a Book of Hours (Bodleian Library MS. Douce 62, fol. 067v)
artist: Attributed to the Master of the Brussels Initials, though there is an extra hand working in the borders
marginalia_description: A hybrid with the head of a man and the legs of a beast looks on as two men wrestle.

label: A Hybrid from a Book of Hours (Bodleian Library MS. Douce 62, fol. 105v)
artist: Attributed to the Master of the Brussels Initials, though there is an extra hand working in the borders
marginalia_description: A detail of hybrid with the upper half of a man and the lower half of a beast uses a lantern to read.

label: A Hybrid from a Psalter (Bodleian Library MS. Douce 118, fol. 009r)
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of a female hybrid, possibly a mermaid or siren, combing her hair with a mirror.

label: Hybrids from a Psalter (Bodleian Library MS. Douce 118, fol. 009v - 010r)
marginalia_description: Multiple hybrids play in bottom margins of these pages. On the left page, there is a hybrid with the head of a man and the body of a dragon. On the right page, a hybrid with the head of a man and a body of a beast chases after a grotesque animal wearing a hat.

label: Hybrids from a Psalter (Bodleian Library MS. Douce 118, fol. 012v - 013r)
marginalia_description: Multiple hybrids play in bottom margins of these pages. On the left page, a grotesque hybrid wearing a mitre holds a blank scroll. On the right page, a female hybrid shoots at a shield-wielding animal.

label: Phoenix from the 'Queen Mary Psalter' (British Library Royal 2 B VII, fol. 93v)
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of a phoenix in a burning nest.

label: A Devil from a Psalter (Bodleian Library MS. Douce 118, fol. 018r)
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of a blue devil playing a horn. On the left of the devil is a small grotesque hybrid.

label: A Demon from a 'Treatise on Active and Contemplative Life' (Bodleian Library MS. Bodl. 100, fol. 072v)
_date: end of the 14th century, drawings are from the first half of the 15th century
marginalia_description: At the bottom of the page, a demon tortures a dark-skinned figure. This drawing, as well as the drawing of the figure with a staff above it, are later additions to the manuscript. The manuscript itself is dated to the end of the 14th century, authored by a Walter Hilton, but the drawings were added in the first half of the 15th century by an unknown artist.

label: A Griffin from a copy of 'The Lives of Saints including St. Brendan' (Bodleian Library MS. Laud Mis. 173, fol. 126r)
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of a griffin, a monster that is half-lion and half-eagle, attacks St. Brendan and other monks while they pray in their boat.

label: A Griffin from a copy of 'The Lives of Saints including St. Brendan' (Bodleian Library MS. Laud Mis. 173, fol. 126v)
marginalia_description: A top-of-the-page detail of a large bird attacking a griffin, a half-lion and half-eagle monster.

label: A Demon from a copy of 'The Lives of Saints including St. Brendan' (Bodleian Library MS. Laud Mis. 173, fol. 128v)
marginalia_description: A top-of-the-page detail of a monstrous demon holding tongs and a torch, setting the sea ablaze around the monks in a boat.

label: A Demon from a copy of 'The Lives of Saints including St. Brendan' (Bodleian Library MS. Laud Mis. 173, fol. 129v)
marginalia_description: A demon with horns or long ears stands behind Judas as he sits by the ocean.

label: A Demon from the 'Tinted Mahzor'
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of a demon.

label: A Centaur from the 'Rutland Psalter' (British Library Add MS 62925, fol. 058v)
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of a female centaur suckling her child. A man in a boat that has a human head looks on from the left.

label: A Dragon from the 'Rutland Psalter' (British Library Add MS 62925, fol. 083r)
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of a naked man riding a multi-legged dragon.

label: A Dragon from the 'Rutland Psalter' (British Library Add MS 62925, fol. 098r)
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of a man holding the tail of a dragon. The man is holding a disembodied leg in his other hand.

label: Phoenix from the 'Queen Mary Psalter' (British Library Royal 2 B VII, fol. 94)
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of a renewed phoenix, emerging from a nest of ashes.

label: A Centaur from a copy of 'Lancelot du Lac' (British Library Royal 20 D IV, fol. 150v)
artist: Attributed to the Master au Menton Fuyant
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of a centaur hunting an ape using a bow.

label: Sirens from the 'Queen Mary Psalter' (British Library Royal 2 B VII, fol. 96v)
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of two sirens in the ocean beside a boat with a sleeping crew.

label: Sirens from the 'Queen Mary Psalter' (British Library Royal 2 B VII, fol. 97)
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of two sirens attacking a ship and its sleeping crew.

label: Unicorn from the 'Queen Mary Psalter' (British Library Royal 2 B VII, fol. 101)
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of a unicorn being speared by a hunter while it lays its head in the lap of a virgin.

label: Hybrids from the 'Queen Mary Psalter' (British Library Royal 2 B VII, fol. 136)
marginalia_description: A bottom-of-the-page detail of two grotesque hybrids fighting. The hybrid on the left appears to be half-dragon, half-lion and the hybrid on the right appears to be half-man, half-dragon.
